name: Hostile Waters Fan-Remake
description:
Introduction

Hello everyone, welcome to my remake project of the old game “Hostile Waters: Antaeus Rising”. Because I loved this game since childhood and I saw the community's desire for a remastered version, I thought I could try to sprinkle some hope. This is by no means a professional project, I'm just a student-level developer after all.

My vision

Let's dream for a bit. I would love it to have multiplayer support, co-op campaign, level editor, unit creator and of course: fully redone game.

Because I'm just a lone programmer and far from a designer, I will introduce huge support for changing the game files. These include: Meshes, textures, sounds, UI images and level data. I'll leave creating and sharing modifications to the forum below.

Current features

Currently it has:

  • Bare-bones main menu.(Quit and new game works)
  • Intro and first level cinema videos.
  • War-room briefing.
  • Ability to switch through units.
  • Scarab recycling (But not everything is polished).
  • Pegasus pickup ability (with nice rope physics).
Closing remarks

Currently I have put about 50 man-hours into this project, so it is LITTERED with bugs. But I wanted to upload this project before my university semester, to show my progress. Hope I will have time to bring updates.
